mapper.select: select nt_no, nt_title from jngis_admin.board_notice_tb where nt_part = 'drone' order by nt_no desc limit 1
select id, target, value from jngis.lsmd_cont_ldreg_json where 1=1 and target = #{target}
select resi_bupd_code as juso_code, sido_nm || ' ' || sgg_nm || ' ' || umd_nm || ' ' || ri_nm as juso_name from jngis_admin.cmt_bup_code where resi_bupd_code = #{jusoCode} and del_ymd = ''
